item.description:
Join NHC'er Josh at the Young Professional Networking Happy Hour at Black Bear Saloon in New Haven. This event is being hosted by The New Haven County Bar Association, Young Lawyers Section, and runs from 5:30 PM to 8:00 PM.

This event is a great opportunity for young professionals from Connecticut to meet each other, share ideas, contacts and referrals.

Black Bear will be providing from 5:30 till 7:30 $2 drafts (all 16) and $2 well drinks. Additionally, drink specials will be provided for the rest of the evening. Black Bear will also be providing free food, including Penne Vodka, salad and bear bites.

Josh will be attending the event and can be contacted at (203)772-0070 if anyone has any questions.
item.name: Young Professional Networking Happy Hour at Black Bear Saloon
